call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - June 26th

topics.title: Version 6.0 and 6.1 Release Status
topics.summary: kushti confirms successful 6.0 and 6.1 releases with no downtime. Voting for activation is expected to begin with potential October activation if successful. Sub-blocks feature development is progressing.

topics.title: Soft Fork Voting Mechanics and Timeline
topics.summary: Mining pools voting yes need no parameter changes, while no votes require configuration. Soft forks require 90%+ consensus to avoid chain splits. Voting begins around July 11-12th with backward compatibility for 5.x nodes.

topics.title: SIGS Mining Pool Operations and Storage Rent
topics.summary: SIGS mining pool is testing new storage rent builds on testnet before mainnet deployment. The pool serves as both mining operation and community hub for Ergo experimentation.

topics.title: Version 6.0 Sidechain and Bitcoin Relay Features
topics.summary: Version 6.0 introduces better sidechain support including trustless two-way pegged merge-mined sidechains and efficient Bitcoin relay capabilities. These features enable experimentation not possible on Bitcoin or Monero.

topics.title: ErgoHack Video Releases and Developer Experience
topics.summary: ErgoHack videos are being released showcasing AI-focused projects. qx() emphasizes the intensive nature of hackathon development and encourages community participation to inspire new developers.

topics.title: Ergoversary Celebration Plans and AMA Schedule
topics.summary: July 1st Ergoversary will feature special AMA with kushti, Joe, qx(), and Dan. qx() completed interview with Dan about Winter Protocol's use of Ergo for on-chain assets. Six-year milestone celebration planned.

topics.title: Ergo's Fair Launch Principles and Market Integrity
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo's commitment to fair launch principles over six years despite market temptations. Centralized exchanges prefer projects with concentrated token supplies for easier manipulation, while Ergo maintains decentralized distribution.

topics.title: VC Rugpulls and Project Owner Dumping
topics.summary: kushti discusses recent VC rugpulls including Mantra and RWN projects experiencing 90-95% drops from coordinated selling. Centralized exchanges benefit from these manipulative practices while truly decentralized projects face listing challenges.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge as Exchange Alternative Solution
topics.summary: Rosen Bridge provides free blockchain integration alternative to expensive centralized exchange listings. New chains can access multi-blockchain liquidity from day one, unlike Ergo's early experience with poor exchanges like Tidex.
